Header: Committee appointed to provide solutions to police problems
Content: The special committee which has been appointed to provide solutions to the grievances of Police Officers at Suhurupaya. The special meeting to provide solutions to the problems is scheduled to take place on Tuesday under the patronage of Presidentâ€™s Chief of Staff, H.M.P. Hitisekera. The Committee will act to provide solutions to professional and duty problems related to promotions, transfers and disciplinary actions. Several other officials including the Five Member Committee appointed on the instructions of the President will take part in the Committee. It will function under the direct supervision of Defence Secretary Hemasiri Fernando.
